sentences.en: "Edinburgh in Focus" provides a warts-and-all look at the city.
sentences.cn: 《聚焦爱丁堡》节目真实地展示了这座城市，包括它的缺点。

sentences.en: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

sentences.en: Focus on the feeling of relaxation.
sentences.cn: 全身心体会放松的感觉。

sentences.en: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.cn: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.en: Her children are the main focus of her life.
sentences.cn: 孩子们是她生活的重心。

sentences.en: His eyes were focussed straight ahead.
sentences.cn: 他的双眼盯着正前方。

sentences.en: His focus switched to the little white ball.
sentences.cn: 他把关注点转移到那个小白球上。

sentences.en: IBM has also shifted its focus from mainframes to personal computers.
sentences.cn: IBM公司也把重心从特大型机转向了个人电脑。

sentences.en: Pictures should be in focus, with realistic colours and well composed groups.
sentences.cn: 照片应该图像清晰，颜色逼真，构图合理。

sentences.en: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.cn: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.en: The conference may help to focus attention on the economy.
sentences.cn: 此次会议可能有助于将关注焦点放在经济上。

sentences.en: The focus of recent research has been on environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 近期的研究重点是环境问题。

sentences.en: The political slant at Focus can be described as centre-right.
sentences.cn: 《焦点》杂志的政治立场可以称为中间偏右。

sentences.en: The research effort has focused on tracing the effects of growing levels of five compounds.
sentences.cn: 研究集中跟踪5种化合物水平上升带来的影响。

sentences.en: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.--Socrates
sentences.cn: 做出改变的秘诀不是多么努力地和过去做斗争，而是全力以赴地去打造全新的自己。

sentences.en: Their talks are expected to focus on arms control.
sentences.cn: 他们的会谈预计会集中讨论军备控制问题。

sentences.en: These issues were brought into sharp focus by the Gulf crisis.
sentences.cn: 海湾危机让这些问题备受关注。

sentences.en: They focus on overt discrimination rather than insidious aspects of racism.
sentences.cn: 他们关注的是公开的歧视，而不是种族主义的一些潜在问题。

sentences.en: Throughout the exercise, focus on keeping your abs tight.
sentences.cn: 整个锻炼过程中，注意要紧绷腹肌。

sentences.en: Today he was able to focus his message exclusively on the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天他得以将主题全部集中在经济方面。

sentences.en: Together these factors determine the depth of focus.
sentences.cn: 这些因素综合起来决定了景深。
